---
category: news
title: "This supermarket has purchased two robotics firms to take on Amazon"
excerpt: "UK online supermarket Ocado has acquired two robotics start-ups from the US as the company looks to boost efficiency in its warehouses. The purchase of San Francisco firm Kindred Systems for $262 million and Las Vegas-based Haddington Dynamics for $25 million in cash and shares should help the retailer introduce more automation solutions."
